definition: paralysis of one side of the body/hemiplegia
paralysis/see also 癱瘓|瘫痪[tan1 huan4]
variant of 風癱|风瘫[feng1 tan1]
"Beijing slouch", sitting posture said to be adopted esp. by Beijingers, popularized by 葛優|葛优[Ge3 You1]

sentences.english: Objective To explore the role of enteral nutrition in the treatment of gastroparesis after abdominal operation.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肠内营养在腹部手术后胃瘫治疗中的作用。

sentences.english: There was no strength in him anymore and his legs folded, his body sagged.
sentences.chinese: 他身上没有任何力气，两腿圈起，身子瘫下去了。

sentences.english: She limpened instantly and fell when she heard the terrible news.
sentences.chinese: 当她听到这个可怕的消息后立即就瘫倒了。

sentences.english: I collapse with my eyes closed on one of the plaid thrift store couches.
sentences.chinese: 我闭上眼，一屁股瘫在了二手彩格尼长沙发上。

sentences.english: Gastroparesis occurs when the stomach retains undigested food for long periods.
sentences.chinese: 胃中长时间留有未消化的食物会导致胃轻瘫的发生。

sentences.english: Lin sofa in the half-day state speechless.
sentences.chinese: 瘫在沙发上的林某半天说不出话来。

sentences.english: Objective To introduce our clinical experience in restoration of hand function in tetraplegia patients following cervical spinal cord injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的介绍重建颈髓损伤四肢瘫患者手功能的临床经验。

sentences.english: ConclusionThe combined conservative treatment is the ideal method to treat the gastric paralysis syndrome.
sentences.chinese: 结论综合保守治疗是胃瘫综合征较为理想的治疗方法。

sentences.english: Court date set for Chinese student in the US.
sentences.chinese: 吻瘫美国机场的中国留学生聆讯日期确定。

sentences.english: Several of the Death Eaters leapt back in their chairs. Draco fell out of his onto the floor.
sentences.chinese: 几个食死徒又坐回到了椅子中，德拉科瘫在了地板上。

sentences.english: About three minutes later, he collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 大约三分钟后，他瘫倒在地。

sentences.english: I heaved him up again, and he collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 我又把他拽起来，而他又一次倒瘫下去。

sentences.english: She crumpled under the lawyer's severe questions.
sentences.chinese: 在律师的严厉质问下，她瘫倒了。

sentences.english: The surgeon lifted up the limping patient and offered to conduct him home.
sentences.chinese: 外科医生把瘫倒的病人扶起来，主动提也送他回家。

sentences.english: Objective To study the diagnosis and treatment of gastroparesis of post nongastric operation of abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨腹部非胃手术后胃瘫的诊断和治疗方法。

definition: (lit.) to lie stiff like a corpse/(coll.) to sleep
to curl up (like a scroll)/to huddle/Melania libertina/wriggle (as a worm)
to collapse (from dehydration or loss of blood)/heat exhaustion
to have a lifeless look in one's eyes (idiom)
